- Location: Ceiling of interior room near a ceiling vent/register (white plastic grille).  
- Ceiling material/finish: Painted textured drywall (orange peel).  
- Observed cracks: Hairline cracks along left ceiling seam and around the vent opening; no visible bulging.  
- Moisture/appearance: No stains or sagging evident in photo.  
- Recommendation: Monitor for widening; if cracks progress, re-tape/mud joints and repaint; inspect attic above for movement or moisture intrusion around vent if cracks worsen.
